description: Defines delivery-related data models and enums for a food delivery application, including an enum for delivery stages with display labels and a data class representing a persisted delivery order with relevant details.

classes.name: DeliveryStage
classes.description: Enumeration representing various stages in the delivery process, with a method to display user-friendly labels.

classes.name: StoredDeliveryOrder
classes.description: Data class representing a persisted delivery order with properties such as id, restaurant name, items summary, timestamps, current stage, next transition time, and instructions.

methods.name: displayLabel
methods.description: Returns a human-readable label for the delivery stage.
